subject: p16875792
Impression: PA and lateral chest compared to : The already improved post-operative widening of the cardiomediastinal silhouette is stable. Moderate right pleural effusion and moderately severe right basal atelectasis are unchanged, but previous left lower lobe atelectasis and left pleural effusion are improved. There is no pulmonary edema or pneumothorax.
